thread.section_title: Italki 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Italki 的点评意见 | www.italki.com
thread.title: Zhenia Fogel
thread.title_full: Italki 的点评人 Zhenia Fogel

author: Zhenia Fogel
title: Zhenia Fogel
text:
italki connects students and teachers for private language tuition, and then lesson happen online on Skype or another platform. This system is great because speaking with a native speakers in one of the most efficient & effective ways of learning a language.
Prices are affordable (every teacher charges a different rate), you can do the lesson anywhere with internet connection. italki is excellent.
